name: ZomBug: A Reaper's Tale
description:
[WEB BUILD IS BROKEN FOR SOME REASON PLEASE PLAY THE WINDOWS VERSION}

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement || MOUSE POINTER - aim

SPACE & SHIFT - melee attack || LEFT CLICK - fire guns

TAB - switch weapon ||  E - interact & proceed dialogues
